milestones.name: connect_adapters
milestones.title: Connect ×©dapters
milestones.description:
You can collect and correlate information about your assets by using Axonius' adapters, which integrate with a wide array of security and IT management solutions.

Go to the Adapters screen to connect at least three adapters to fetch data for your devices and users from at least three different sources.

milestones.name: examine_device
milestones.title: Examine a device profile
milestones.description:
You can examine the details about your devices by looking at their profiles, which displays the data that Axonius collected and correlated from multiple sources.

Use the Devices screen or the search bar on Axonius Dashboard to search for a device and examine its profile.

milestones.title: Save a query
milestones.description:
You can identify security gaps by running and saving a query about your assets.

Use the Query Wizard on the Devices screen to create a query, then save it so you can easily access it in the future.

milestones.name: device_tag
milestones.title: Tag a device
milestones.description:
You can tag a single asset or a group of assets that share common characteristics. Use tags to assign context to your assets for granular filters and queries.

Go to the Devices screen, tag a few devices with shared characteristics, then issue a query that includes the new tag.

milestones.name: enforcement_executed
milestones.title: Create and execute an enforcement set
milestones.description:
You can take action on the identified security gaps by defining Enforcement Sets in the Axonius Security Policy Enforcement Center.

Go to the Enforcement Center screen to create and execute an Enforcement Set.

milestones.name: dashboard_created
milestones.title: Create a dashboard chart
milestones.description:
You can customize the Axonius Dashboard with charts that track the relevant metrics and show immediate insights based on your saved queries.

Go to the Axonius Dashboard, and add a chart to a new custom space.

milestones.name: report_generated
milestones.title: Generate a report
milestones.description:
You can generate a PDF document to share dashboards and query results in an executive-friendly format.

Go to the Reports screen, and create a report based on the query you saved earlier.
